title: Quiting Can you help?
body: Hey anyone here available to farm ip for me? Just the daily bonus when possible. I am quitting the game but might come back one day :)

replies.body:
that is account sharing and I recommend that you don't because you become responsible for there acts on your  account and I think it is against the summoners code aswell.

so try to be careful but you will need to read up on it to be sure.
